column1: '''Level 9 Computing''' was the developer and publisher of [[The Middle-Earth Trilogy]] ([[Colossal Adventure]]
column2: <ref>[http://www.giantbomb.com/colossal-adventure/61-13226/ Colossal Adventure] at Giantbomb (retrieved 4 September 2010)</ref> [[Adventure Quest]]<ref>[http://www.giantbomb.com/adventure-quest/61-19235/ Adventure Quest] at Giantbomb (retrieved 4 September 2010)</ref> and [[Dungeon Adventure]]<ref>[http://www.giantbomb.com/dungeon-adventure/61-13226/ Dungeon Adventure] at Giantbomb (retrieved 4 September 2010)</ref>).<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/level9.html The Middle-Earth Trilogy] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 4 September 2010)</ref>
